name: Hell Rush (Adil)
description:
Hell Rush is a simple 3d parkour game with wall running and other parkour mechanics. You have to avoid the obstacles and complete all the levels in order to get out of hell.

How To Play
  • WASD To move
  • Jump to activate and hold shift and W key to wall run
  • Space to Jump
XG Jam

This game is made for XG Jam, and created within 1 week, so it may not be that polished, but its a good one!

Credits:

Textures: Kenney Prototype Textures

Sound: Adil Shafiq

Level Designing: Adil Shafiq

Thanks for downloading and playing the game!
